Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Technique: FORMED BY HAND; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE; ENGRAVED
Name: Frog
Description: This small object in faience which was found in a tomb at Sanam in Nubia, represents a frog. Associated with the goddess of birth, Heqet, the animal became a symbol of rebirth and eternity. Carried as an amulet, it would protect the wearer in the crucial moments of life.
